title: Bloomcast - Python Facilitating Operational Oceanography
summary: Bloomcast is a daily prediction of the beginning of the aquatic growing season in the Strait of Georgia. Python makes it possible by collecting meteorological and river flow data, running a Fortran code, analyzing its results, and publishing the prediction to the web - all while I sleep.
